### Features

- ☑️ Modern tech stack with Next.js, Typescript, Tailwind.css, React, Motion.
- ☑️ Minimal design with a focus on user experience.
- ☑️ Easy to customize and extend and adapt to your database schema.
- ☑️ Deployed on Vercel.

### Depndencies

- Next.js 16
- Typescript 5
- Tailwind.css v4
- React 19
- Shadcn
- Motion

### Sections

- Product Gallery
- Product Details
- Product Sizes
- Product Colors
